title: #76 - The Fontainebleau School of Music and Architecture with Nicholas Stanos, VP of Fine Arts
itunes:title: #76 - The Fontainebleau School of Music and Architecture with Nicholas Stanos, VP of Fine Arts
description:
Founded in 1923, The Fontainebleau Schools are comprised of the Conservatoire Américaine and the École des Beaux-Arts. For almost 100 years the schools have been offering international summer programs of the highest level for students in music and architecture.

  • www.fontainbleaushcool.org

The Midnight Charette is now The Second Studio.
